1

Hot Magma 6 1 1 - 2

Enutrofs summon a torrent of molten lava. If they possess a Treasure, they consume it to blind the targets within the spell's area of effect.

Normal effects

Damage: 7
If the Enutrof possesses Treasures:
- Blinded (+3 Lvl.)
- Consumes Treasures

Critical effects

Damage: 8
If the Enutrof possesses Treasures:
- Blinded (+3 Lvl.)
- Consumes Treasures
